page.title: 07Katherine's day
page.content: On a typical Saturday morning my alarm clock wakes me up about 7.15. I go downstairs to see what's on TV. At 8.30 I make my mum and baby brother a cup of tea and biscuits. Then at 9.00 I have my breakfast which is Shreddies and milk, sometimes I have two slices of toast. Then I get ready for tennis which starts at 10 and finishes at 11. It is called Thorpe Bay Lawn Tennis Club. I meet my schoolfriend Faith there, we aren't very good. Afterwards we go to the tuckshop and buy all our sweets,we eat them in the cadet hut. Then Faith's mum or dad come and pisk her up. I ride home again on my bike. I drink a big glass of icy water. For lunch we just have a sandwich and a packet of crisps.In the afternoon I play until tea-time, and then we normally have a roast dinner. Written by Katherine Read (9yrs)
